# Структура Data Room — Template

**Версия**: 0.1.0  
**Контакт**: [FOUNDERS_EMAIL]

---

## Data Room Organization

```
/DataRoom-RorkKiku/
├── 00_README.md (этот файл)
├── 01_Executive_Summary/
│   ├── Pitch_Deck.pdf
│   ├── One_Pager.pdf
│   └── Company_Overview.pdf
├── 02_Corporate_Documents/
│   ├── Certificate_of_Incorporation.pdf
│   ├── Bylaws.pdf
│   ├── Cap_Table.xlsx
│   └── Board_Resolutions/
├── 03_IP/
│   ├── Trademark_Registrations/
│   ├── IP_Assignment_Agreements/
│   └── OSS_Licenses.md
├── 04_Financial/
│   ├── Financial_Model.xlsx
│   ├── Budget_2026.xlsx
│   └── Bank_Statements/ (restricted)
├── 05_Product_Tech/
│   ├── Architecture.pdf
│   ├── MVP_Spec.pdf
│   ├── Roadmap.pdf
│   └── Tech_Stack.md
├── 06_Legal_Compliance/
│   ├── Privacy_Policy.pdf
│   ├── Terms_of_Service.pdf
│   ├── COPPA_Compliance.pdf
│   └── GDPR_Compliance.pdf
├── 07_Contracts/
│   ├── Employment_Agreements/
│   ├── Partner_Agreements/
│   └── Vendor_Agreements/
├── 08_Traction/
│   ├── Pilot_Results.pdf
│   ├── User_Growth_Charts/
│   └── Testimonials/
└── 09_Team/
    ├── Team_Roster.xlsx
    ├── Org_Chart.pdf
    └── Key_Resumes/ (restricted)
```

---

## Descriptions

### 01_Executive_Summary
Quick overview для investors (start here).

### 02_Corporate_Documents
Legal structure, ownership, governance.

### 03_IP
Intellectual property assets.

### 04_Financial
Financial model, budgets, actuals.

### 05_Product_Tech
Product specs, architecture, roadmap.

### 06_Legal_Compliance
Privacy policies, compliance docs.

### 07_Contracts
All agreements (employment, partnerships, vendors).

### 08_Traction
Proof of product-market fit (metrics, testimonials).

### 09_Team
Team information, org chart, key personnel.

---

**Access Levels**:
- **Public**: Executive summary, pitch deck
- **NDA Required**: All other folders
- **Restricted**: Bank statements, personal resumes

**Contact**: [FOUNDERS_EMAIL]
